u.a: ABE at car , turns wheel . VAL begins account , while exploring room . this is val's account of webb's experiment , which she relates at direction of experimenter . VAL picks up tape measure , ABE glances as she talks .
VAL stands still and speaks . VAL moves off , picks up iron , turns to ABE . VAL distracted , looks about room , goes to stove , opens door of oven
val's speech fades out , moves from stove to floor , gasps as she finds blocks .
ABE leaves car , joins her as she begins to play with firetruck
VAL diverted , moves about , picks up pipe and carries it , mumbles ABE absorbed in fire truck VAL moves to box , mumbles
VAL sees dress up clothes , this is louder . ABE looks up at VAL and fire hat VAL goes through play clothes
ABE sings to self and then addresses VAL . VAL looks up at this .
VAL moves to box very matter of fact . VAL picks up receiver of telephone and dials while answering .
exaggerated

VAL plays , smiles at ABE second repeat faster ABE moves past her , smiling and repeats this as question in appreciation ABE rolls fire truck on wooden car , goes to pick up ladder , talks to himself , singing
VAL moves toward sofa , points ABE looks up at snake as VAL speaks with pretended fright , really more surprise .
ABE looks at VAL speaks slowly and directly play condescension .
VAL laughs .
ABE using baby talk "kwaym"
ABE using baby talk "kwaym"
VAL picks up lunch box
ABE using baby talk
VAL moves behind car and then VAL finds tools
ABE puts ladders together

VAL looks up at his exclamation and glances , but is more absorbed in her discovery , VAL brings toy tool to car . ABE glances at tools VAL glances at ladder as ABE speaks expressively VAL looks at toys and speaks rapidly , ABE glances at toys .
ABE returns to car and ladder . addressed to the ladder
VAL interested in car , touches it .
ABE plays with fire truck
VAL gestures to car
VAL leans on car and watches abe's fire truck cab of fire truck falls off .
ABE fixes it .
VAL gets up VAL bored , obscured talk .
ABE replies abstractedly and a little fuzzy . VAL goes to wall , cab falls off again
ABE still at car .
VAL tries on hat , takes it off
ABE sings "bum bum" while fingers walk up ladder , VAL looks
VAL passes car , token play with ABE , then wanders off
VAL soft
ABE looks around at this .
VAL speaks with play voice , VAL giggles ABE watches a few seconds and returns to fire ladder play . no direct gaze
ABE looks up for a moment at this .
VAL has pipe , picks up tape measure fails to interest ABE in tool belt and tape measure
ABE drops part of car , truck falls off car , VAL and ABE exchange glances
VAL sees car vacant and touches it , asking permission
"okay" is slow
VAL gets on , then off , gets on climbs on back
ABE drive seeriously while VAL talks . VAL puts arms around ABE to keep from falling off .
voices are calm and there is little physical activity , soft driving noise made by
VAL offers suggestion , attractively , as an alternative to monsters .
ABE accepts with some enthusiasm
VAL gets off car as part of game , ABE follows her .
VAL speaks in high enthusiastic voice , VAL presents lunch box to ABE who seems to accept it as part of game , ABE takes tools to car VAL goes to stove , opens oven
ABE does look as asked .
VAL holds up shoes to show ABE VAL puts shoes in oven turns knobs . takes them out and shows abe
ABE finds necklaces in tool box and immediately brings it to val
she puts it around her neck and she reacts "Oh"
VAL takes off necklace to propose more complicated game , which ABE accepts .
ABE takes necklace back , goes to car while VAL turns back to stove
VAL works at stove .
ABE carries out plan , puts necklace back in lunch box , gets on car and makes driving noises on way home
VAL sees broom and starts sweeping as part of play act ABE parks car and comes in with lunch box
at this , VAL stands smiling with eyes closed . ABE goes to couch with lunch box and prepares to open it , VAL still grins delightedly
VAL adds sweeping with eyes closed to act like housewife
VAL sweeps ABE gently .
ABE hands her necklace , she reaches out for it with "oh" of delight and speaks in very high "feminine" voice .
ABE takes up his lunch box .
xxx is singing
VAL points to snake .
VAL laughs as reply to this . ABE hums as he takes lunch box to car
VAL removes necklace , kneels at stove , but laughs at "stew" ABE hums .
VAL turns from the stove to face ABE on the car as she addresses him
VAL accepts his change of topic aggreeably but then proceeds to direct the conversation again toward cooking
VAL throws her head back in a very "feminine" way
as VAL stands up , she appears to discover bag of clothes and seizes on ties as a good attention getter for her working husband
when ABE doesn't seem to show any interest , she raises her voice , and addresses directly
the falling broom occupies val's attention , and her response to this is uncertain .
VAL returns to stove and starts fooling with the knobs , she quickly tires of them VAL says this clearly and with an eye to ABE , for it serves as her excuse to get on the car .
to baby
ABE is shocked at val's takeover of car . VAL laughs when ABE realizes that she has car .
now she keeps it with play act ruse but her choice of the baby role is her downfall .
ABE addresses her as baby and begins pulling her off the car . VAL holds tight and seems to enjoy the whole thing .
VAL again turns her ruse to her advantage by insisting that ABE , as the father , lift her off the car .
ABE doesn't seem to relish the father role , and as soon as he has gotten VAL off the car , he gets on
resignedly , ABE allows VAL on back .
VAL gets on , wiggling and squirming . she wraps her arms around abe
to baby
said straight intonation . this meets with no response from val
VAL gets off the car , picks up something from the floor and walks toward the sofa . ABE watches .
ABE obeys this and closes his eyes . VAL runs up , dumps the stuff in the steering wheel .
ABE is happy with it and smiles with this .
ABE quickly decides to use the tools on the "broken" car .

VAL laughs at "broken" . VAL quickly perceives the high interest of the car and gears her next gift toward it by saying she has a necklace for the car . she drapes the necklace over the steering wheel .

ABE is in the back of the car fooling with the license plate . VAL takes the lunch box she had placed on the car and takes it over to the stove . ABE abruptly gets up , goes over to the light switch and turns it off and then on .
because the spotlights don't go out , is appropriate . ABE returns to the tools and the car , looks at VAL cooking .
VAL returns rapidly to the topic of cooking ABE is preoccupied with the tools
VAL abruptly stops all food talk and comes over to the car with the tape measure and begins "measuring" the car .
ABE shows little interest until now . he takes hold of the measure and places it on the car .

VAL takes it back , places it on her body , twists around and sings "poop poop" . ABE and VAL laugh at her silliness . VAL returns to her measuring briefly , turns from the car , poop talks , again twisting her body . VAL laughs at herself , with ABE , and then drops the tape measure .
ABE refers to the measure which he now picks up
VAL reaches for another tool and works on the far side of the car .
ABE uses the tape . VAL takes the flashlight over to the oven and places it in there .
ABE picks up the tool belt and the tape measure and heads over toward the oven . he sits down beside it .
in a burst of energy , ABE reaches in the oven for his flashlight , while VAL watches delightedly
VAL bends over and takes a mock bit out of the flashlight
VAL again bends over for a "bite"
VAL picks up the lunchbox .

at her mention of the word "flashlight" , ABE reaches over , grabs it and hides it behind his back . VAL laughs in response . VAL then takes the tool belt and puts it in the oven ABE reaches into the oven and takes it . there is much excited activity in the vicinity of the oven door . the grabbing is part of the fun , not done with serious intent .
VAL pretends to be eating something .
VAL takes the pliers from the floor , stands up and throws it across the room
ABE turns to the oven

VAL pats his back in a comradely way and kneels back down . they are both sitting down in front of the oven concerned with stuffing things in the oven , although VAL seems content to watch ABE do most of the work . they both fool with the control knobs .
VAL hits ABE on the rear and back , more forcefully than before , and then grabs him .
ABE picks something up and places it on the stove .
as VAL agrees to heat it up and stuffs the object in the oven , ABE gets up and walks away .
at this VAL looks up .
in this VAL enunciates "trashcan" very clearly VAL twists around to watch his search and laughs at his efforts to search in the trashcan because she knows it's not there .
spoken rather triumphantly .
VAL turns to see , then turns to stove and starts pulling things from the oven . ABE comes over and watches .
ABE kneels down to pick the things up .
VAL again pretends to be eating . VAL stands up to watch ABE as he collects the objects from the floor .
VAL pats ABE on the back
VAL kneels down at the stove and opens the oven door so that ABE can stuff the objects inside
they are both sitting in front of the stove , looking at it , fooling with the knobs
abe's attention turns to the bag of clothes . he pulls out a tie . VAL stands up to watch him . she laughts in response to this .
VAL notices a tool sitting on the car . she goes to get it and returns to the stove .
ABE is busy with the clothes and does not pick up his head until VAL returns and speaks with increasing loudness .
ABE has pulled out a skirt from the bag and is concerned with covering the stove with it .
VAL runs back to the car and sits on it .
ABE pays no visual attention to val's that but does respond with this in an attempt to refute her claim that he's using the skirt improperly .
VAL laughs at ABE , this does not appear to be addressed to val
said in a high voice . she throws a necklace on the floor . ABE turns around to get it .
he picks it up , stands up and drapes the necklace on the steering wheel as VAL watches .
ABE grabs the steering wheel and both children turn it . there is a power struggle over possession of the car , but done more as a game than a fight .

ABE concedes by going to the back of the car and climbing on . VAL , as driver , sways with the wheel , sings , and takes on a hearty voice as conductor . ABE kneels , behind . he gets off to pick up the indian pipe and VAL tells him to "get on quick" .

ABE returns and VAL continues to occupy conductor role by making driving noises . she leans her body back into abe's and bumps him . VAL is preoccupied with the wheel , ABE is staring at the wall opposite the camera . ABE gives no verbal response to this but turns and seems to be putting the pipe in val's ear .
she backs away and responds this .
she backs away and responds this .
she backs away and responds this .

ABE suddenly gets off the car and goes to the door . VAL watches him and then twists her whole body so that she can see better . she turns around and gets back on the car , but for the most part her glance is concentrated on ABE at the door . ABE seems to be speaking to himself at the door , but he suddenly runs over to VAL and tells her something about what he's seen . she appears interested , but then turns her attention back to steering . ABE stands there , as if waiting for something . ABE examines the big box , turns back to the car .
both children are on floor .
ABE emerging from box . VAL gets back on the car , and ABE crawls back into the box . VAL watches him .
